welcome_message: Hey %s, I'm Oilly ü§ñ and I'll help you remember changing your car oil, so you have one less thing to worry about üòÅ
date_or_algorithm: Would you like me send you notifications in a specific date, or automatically based on my algorithm
remind_algorithm: Remind me based on my algorithm (recommended)
remind_me_in_question: When do you want me to remind you?
will_remind_you_in: Great I'll remind you to change your oil after %s monthe(s), at %s
current_mileage_question: 1- What is the current mileage in (km) as shown in your car dashboard?

oil_change_frequency_explain: üëâ Type only number of days without the word `days`.

thanks_for_your_feedback: Thanks %s, for sharing your experience with me. I will make sure to improve Oilily upon it.
send_me_your_feedback: Please share with me your experience using Oilly by typing /feedback then your feedback. or hit me on twitter @nagiworks.

done_last_question: This is the last question, please select your answer then tap Done
waiting_for_confirmation: I received your answer, please tap Done button attached to the question to move to the next question.
